programme.title: L'autre versant de la montagne
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1975. The true life story of a champion skier whose dreams are dashed after an accident that leaves her paralyzed.
Réalisation : L. Peerce
Avec : Marilyn Hassett Beau Bridges Belinda Montgomery

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: We take to the ice with Kelly Serbu, captain of the Canadian National Blind Hockey team, to learn what makes him tick at the rink and in the courtroom. Plus, Greg Westlake learns about ParaSport TV live stream.

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S04EP08) In this episode: Community counts. An active senior citizen starts to doubt his capabilities and worth when his vision slips.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP35) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we are joined by Dawn Pickering, who describes her experiences raising a child who is blind. We discuss the challenges, lessons learned and support available for parents.

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) In this episode of Disrupt, hosted by Taylor Olson, we introduce you to drag artists, an artist who is Deaf, a poet and a musician.
Année : 2023

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) From puberty to old age, disability impacts our sex lives in big and small ways. Rachele examines the way our needs and desires change throughout the course of our lives.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP02) Philiz is a ball of energy who struggles with chronic fatigue. After getting stuck in a style rut during her recovery, she's on the hunt for elevated, accessible pieces to take her to the next level.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Andrea Khanjin, Conservative MPP, and Jennifer McKelvie, Toronto City Councillor, review the Ontario government's environmental record and discuss what needs to be done to help preserve green spaces in Toronto and around Ontario.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) You'll be hooked after you try Halifax-based Instagram food influencer Andy Hay's fish tacos with mango slaw, paired with a mocktail Margarita. It's an East Coast food fiesta you won't want to miss.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP11) Chris and Alex help a coffee enthusiast start the day right, by turning an armoire into a coffee bar. Later, they help a friend enjoy his evenings by building a swing bed for his backyard.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S04EP02) Things are getting scalloped and chowdered as fashion guru Jeanne Beker joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP06) Meet the cast of characters at Real Wheels Acting Academy, a one-of-a-kind program focusing on professional training and empowerment for local actors in the disability community.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S04EP02) Chris Judge and the community workshop crew offer tons of ideas for transforming Heather's basic kitchen into a dreamy, picture perfect baking station.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP04) After an armed robber is murdered by his accomplice during a heist, Murdoch's prime suspect is an incredibly perceptive man who claims to be Sherlock Holmes.

programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
The Tetra Society's focus is to find solutions to overcome environmental barriers faced by people with disabilities, including sex toys. In this episode, we'll follow each step of a request being fulfilled.

programme.desc:

programme.desc:
